products.name: PEARLY BRIDAL PADDED HEADBAND
products.description: Faux pearls cover this wide headband, with a lightly padded top and woven fabric underside.

products.name: GLITTER ENVELOPE CLUTCH BAG
products.description: An ultra-fine glitter coating gives this streamlined style a sophisticated sparkle, and if features a slinky chain strap that can be tucked inside. It fastens with a magnet clasp and has a chic satin lining.
